name: Vu Linh Ecolodge and Thac Ba Reservoir - V10
description: The two-day trip to Vu Linh Ecolodge and Thac Ba Reservoir will offer you opportunities to learn about the culture of Vietnam ethnic groups as well as to participate in their daily activities such as picking up few plants for cooking and herbal bathing. Also, you can spend time cruising on traditional boats to immerse in the peaceful scenery of Thac Ba Reservoir. Especially, our short tour is operated under the sustainable development project; therefore, joining the tour means that you will contribute to preserve the cultural features of Vietnam ethnic minorities and develop the local community. Certainly, you will have memorable trip with lots of fascinating experience on the Northwest region of Vietnam!
